info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests; Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'none'; Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 18 Sep 2022 05:54:37 GMT Pragma: no-cache Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: webServer1 Set-Cookie: .AspNetCore.Antiforgery.O33mliWV2hE=CfDJ8HCNlEoOZ1pMqWt9zgJGSr5jOfHqESi9lUgXFdaJ2ZMk3ITNZo7emhkdyLvydpm3UCiZkBpNdm5y30BQaGxc01NfjcJ5urUaUelWVPrwXkm2_e07ieB3lprjyGUsfCNdaA8PKd3pIo9kN2GqIrbjv4U; path=/; samesite=strict; httponly Set-Cookie: BWROUTEID=3ddbb54ff84f9a8db100e8cb35c25ae2.1; Path=/; Secure Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Rappel Consommateur - Accueil

info.name: Security.txt File
author: bad5ect0r
info.description: The website defines a security policy.

request:
GET /.well-known/security.txt HTTP/1.1
Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests;
Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors 'none';
Content-Type: text/plain
Date: Sun, 18 Sep 2022 05:54:53 GMT
Etag: "1d83dbf6b8ed4cd"
Last-Modified: Tue, 22 Mar 2022 07:35:36 GMT
Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin
Server: WebServer2
Set-Cookie: BWROUTEID=3ddbb54ff84f9a8db100e8cb35c25ae2.2; Path=/; Secure
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

﻿Contact: mailto:securite.informatique@dgccrf.finances.gouv.fr
Contact: mailto:siccrf@dgccrf.finances.gouv.fr 
Contact: https://www.economie.gouv.fr/hfds/cybersecurite-et-politique-ministerielle-ssi

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden Connection: close Content-Length: 199 Content-Type: text/html; charset=iso-8859-1 Date: Sun, 18 Sep 2022 05:55:01 GMT 403 Forbidden

Forbidden

You don't have permission to access this resource.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: rappel.conso.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://rappel.conso.gouv.fr/'
